186490.「遅れて 申し訳ありませぬ。 \n ……ですが さすがは <cs_pchero>:
Sorry for the delay. But as expected of
<cs_pchero>. It seems you've already defeated
the monster.

186491.「おい 父ちゃん！\n 遅刻するなんて かっこ悪りぃぞ！: Hey, Dad! It's not cool to be late!

186492.「なっ……！ ルビー！！\n 村で 兵士たちと 待っていなさいと\n 言っただろ:
Wha...! Ruby! I told you to wait in the
village with the soldiers!

186493.「あんな 何もねぇ村で\n じっとなんか してられるか。: I can't just sit around in that empty village.

186494.「……やれやれ 困ったものです。 \n 闇の領界に 着いてすぐに こいつが\n:
...Sheesh, what a bother. I found her
following me as soon as I arrived in the Dark
Realm.

186495.「何度も 戻るようにと 言ったのですが\n ちっとも 聞きやしない。\n そのせ:
I told her several times to go back home, but
she wouldn't listen. That's why I was so
late...

186496.「……ったく 協団ってのは あれもダメ\n これもダメって うるさいよなあ。:
...Everyone at the cooperative was so noisy,
saying "Don't do this" and "Don't do that".

186497.「それに比べて ここは 落ち着くなー。\n はじめて来たのに なんだか 懐かしい:
Compared to that, I feel more at home here.
Even though it's my first time here, it feels
so nostalgic.

186498.「なあ 父ちゃん。\n ここで一緒に 住むってのは どうだ？: Hey, Dad. How about we move in here together?

186499.「バカなこと 言うんじゃない。\n こんな危険な場所に 住めるわけないだろう。:
Don't be ridiculous. There's no way we could
live in such a dangerous place.

186502.「そんな世界に なったら\n こうして 一緒に出かけるのも いいな。:
When the world becomes such a world, it would
be nice to go out together like this.

186505.「……はっ！ こうしている場合ではない！\n 暴魔が 倒されたことを\n カイラ:
...Ha! This is not the time! I have to report
to Chief Kairam that the demon has been
defeated.

186506.「<cs_pchero>殿 カーラモーラ村に\n 戻りましょう。:
<cs_pchero> Let's go back to Carlamora
Village.

186512.「あの魔物が 暴魔と思われるのですが \n 先ほどから ピクリとも 動かないので:
That monster, which I think is a rampaging
demon, hasn't moved a muscle since a few
minutes ago. Is it asleep or something?

186513.「まるで 遺跡の一部が\n 魔物化したかのようです……。:
It's as if some of the ruins have been turned
into monsters...

186515.「なんだか 不思議なチカラを\n 感じます……。: I feel some kind of mysterious power...

186521.「この 妖しき風のようなものは\n 深海のほこらで 見たものと同じ……。\n こ:
This spectral wind is the same as the one I
saw in the deep-sea dust... Could this be the
source of the demon?

186522.「なんと……？\n これは 魔瘴というものなのですか！？\n それが魔物に憑りつ:
What the...? Is this demon miasma? It
possesses monsters and gives birth to
demons...?

186523.「では……もしや\n あの石も 魔瘴に……？: So... if that stone is also demon miasma...?

186524.「<cs_pchero>殿……その話 後ほど\n 大神殿で くわしく お聞かせく:
<cs_pchero>...Please tell me more about that
story later in the Great Temple.

186526.「なっ……！\n 魔瘴を 食らっただと……！？: What...! You ate a demon miasma?

186528.「いったい あれは\n なんなんだ……？: What in the world was that...?

186529.「……とにかく いったん イーサの村に戻り\n ノグリット村長に 報告することに:
...Anyway, we'll go back to Ether Village and
report back to Chief Noglit.

186531.「<pc>殿 申し訳ありません。\n ルビーが 体調を崩してしまったので\n 先:
<pc> I am so sorry. Ruby has been
sick, so I had to leave first.

186532.「あんなに 元気だったのに\n いったい どうしたことか……？\n 早く よくな:
He was so healthy... What happened to him? I
hope she gets better soon.

186533.「……っと すみません。それでは 暴魔の正体が\n 魔瘴が憑いた 魔物だという話:
...Oh, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. Now, could you
tell me more about the story of the demon
possessed by the demon miasma?<yesno><close>

186534.「このような時に 冗談はおやめください。\n 事は 一刻を争うのです。:
Please don't joke around at a time like this.
There is not a moment to lose.

186535.<pc>は 神獣パチャティカから\n聞いた話を トビアスに伝えた。:
<pc> told Tobias what he had heard
from the God Beast Pachatika.

186536.「なんと……！ ナドラガ神の体内に\n 宿っていた魔瘴が ナドラガンド全土に\n:
Oh my...! The demon miasma inside God
Nadraga's body has scattered all over
Nadragand...!

186537.「おまけに 何者かが 魔瘴のチカラを\n 集めていると……。:
In addition, someone or something is
collecting demon miasma power...

186538.「そういえば アヴィーロ遺跡で 魔瘴を食らい \n 飛び去っていった魔物が いま:
Come to think of it, there was a monster that
ate demon miasma and flew away at Aviro Ruins,
wasn't there? I wonder if that was it...?

186539.「そして 再び現れたという 邪悪なる意志……。\n 奴が あの 魔瘴食らいを使っ:
And the Evil Will that he says has
reappeared... if he's using that miasma eater
to collect demon miasma...

186540.「……くそッ！ これは 大変なことになったぞ。 \n 邪悪なる意志を見つけだし:
...Damn! This is a big deal. Evil Will must be
found and stopped...!

186541.「すぐに 全領界の者に このことを伝え\n 奴の捜索に あたりましょう。:
We must immediately inform the entire domain
and search for him.

186542.「邪悪なる意志の行方が わかり次第\n また ご連絡させていただきます。\n ご:
We will contact you again as soon as we know
the whereabouts of Evil Will. Thank you for
your cooperation.

186543.「協団長となった 今でも\n <pc>殿には 助けられてばかり……\n 私は 何:
Even now, as a leader of a cooperative, I am
constantly helped by <pc>... nothing
has changed for me...

186544.「<pc>殿のように 強くなるため\n やはり 竜化の術を 体得しなければ……！:
In order to become as powerful as
<pc>, I still need to master the art
of dragonification...!

186545.「……かつて 私は エステラとともに\n ナダイアさまから 竜化の術を学んでいま:
I used to learn the art of dragonification
from Nadaia, together with Estella.

186546.「しかし それは 困難を極め\n 私は ついに 術を 体得することが\n できな:
But it was so difficult that I finally could
not master the method...

186547.「暴魔に立ち向かうには 竜化の術が必要……。\n 今一度 鍛錬を積み直し\n 必:
To confront the demons, we need the art of
dragonification... I will train once again and
master it.

192170.「皆が安心して 外に出歩ける世界にしたいと\n 思っている。:
I want a world where everyone can walk out
safely.
